data.name: Super Grappling Gecko
data.detailed_description:
Swing over spikes and pits, find the secrets of a mysterious tree and overcome difficult challenges as a brave tiny lizard in this small adventure.





Super Grappling Gecko is an exploration game where you need to help a brave tiny lizard to succeed in his adventure with nothing but a hook. In this small adventure, you'll find challenging areas and dangerous enemies. Grab your hook and enjoy this adventure!





Features
- Classic Grappling Hook system.
- Explore a challenging world with hidden places.
- Short gameplay.
- 2D frame-by-frame animation.
- Speedrun friendly.
- Challenging Achievements.

What Super Grappling Gecko does not offer
- Combat system


Super Grappling Gecko is a metroidvania focused on exploration. Some other traits of this game: beautiful pixel art, original soundtrack, and skill challenger. It's perfect for players who like wholesome games and for players who enjoy speedrun.



Super Grappling Gecko was developed by 7 game developers from Brazil. Together they have founded Calangames and want to develop many more small, unique, and fun indie games in the future.

We love to hear feedback from the community, so feel free to contact us! We will do our best to respond to messages quickly and fix any problems that may arise. ðŸ˜ƒ

data.short_description: Swing over spikes and pits, find the secrets of a mysterious tree and overcome difficult challenges as a brave tiny lizard in this small adventure.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 2.2GHz ou AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+ 2.8GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 240 GT ou Radeon HD 6570 - 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2300 ou AMD FX6120
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 or Radeon similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
